00030 #ifndef TEXT_CONFIG_H_
00031 #define TEXT_CONFIG_H_

00033 #include <ctype.h>
00034 
00035 #include <map>
00036 #include <string>
00037 #include <fstream>
00038 #include <cstdlib>
00039 #include <stdexcept>
00040 #include <vector>

00042 #ifndef DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN
00043 #define DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN(TypeName) \
00044       TypeName(const TypeName&);           \
00045       void operator=(const TypeName&)

00079 class TextConfig {
00080   public:
00084     TextConfig(size_t level = 3): recursion_level_(level) {}
00085 
00090     explicit TextConfig(const char *s, size_t level = 3)
00091         :recursion_level_(level)
00092     {
00093         read_from_file(s);
00094     }
00095 
00100     TextConfig& operator<< (const char *s)
00101     {
00102         insert(std::string(s));
00103         return *this;
00104     }
00105 
00110     TextConfig& operator<< (const std::string &str)
00111     {
00112         insert(str);
00113         return *this;
00114     }
00115 
00121     int get_int(const std::string &key, int defval = 0) const
00122     {
00123         return (get_value(key))?atoi(reserve_.c_str()):defval;
00124     }
00125 
00131     long get_long(const std::string &key, long defval = 0) const
00132     {
00133         return (get_value(key))?atol(reserve_.c_str()):defval;
00134     }
00135 
00142     long get_longlong(const std::string &key, long long defval = 0) const
00143     {
00144         return (get_value(key))?atoll(reserve_.c_str()):defval;
00145     }
00146 
00152     long get_double(const std::string &key, double defval = 0.0) const
00153     {
00154         return (get_value(key))?strtod(reserve_.c_str(), NULL):defval;
00155     }
00156 
00164     const char* get_cstr(const std::string &key, const char *defval = NULL) const
00165     {
00166         return (get_value(key))?reserve_.c_str():defval;
00167     }
00168 
00176     void get_vector(const std::string &key, std::vector<std::string> *out)
00177     {
00178         std::string::size_type break_pos, pos;
00179         std::string s;
00180 
00181         if (get_value(key) == false)
00182             return false;
00183         for (pos = 0; pos < reserve_.npos; pos = break_pos + 1) {
00184             break_pos = reserve_.find(',', pos);
00185             if (break_pos == reserve_.npos)
00186                 break_pos = reserve_.npos - 1;
00187             trim(reserve_.substr(pos, break_pos - pos), &s);
00188             if (!s.empty())
00189                 out->push_back(s);
00190         }
00191         return true;
00192     }
00193     
00198     void dump(std::string *out) const
00199     {
00200         std::map<std::string, std::string>::const_iterator it;
00201         out->clear();
00202 
00203         for (it = map_.begin(); it != map_.end(); it++) {
00204             out->append(it->first).append(" = ");
00205             out->append(it->second).append("\n");
00206         }
00207     }
00208 
00212     void read_from_file(const char *filename)
00213     {
00214         std::ifstream ifs(filename);
00215         if (ifs.is_open()) {
00216             std::string line, trimmed_line;
00217             while (!(std::getline(ifs, line).eof())) {
00218                 trim(line, &trimmed_line);
00219                 if (!trimmed_line.empty() && trimmed_line[0] != '#')
00220                     insert(trimmed_line);
00221             }
00222         } else {
00223             throw std::runtime_error(
00224                     std::string("can not open configuration file ") +
00225                     std::string(filename) + std::string("."));
00226         }
00227     }
00228 
00229   protected:
00231     typedef std::map<std::string, std::string> item_type;
00233     size_t recursion_level_;
00235     item_type map_;
00237     mutable std::string reserve_; 
00238 
00244     static void trim(const std::string &s, std::string *out)
00245     {
00246         static const char       whitespace[] = " \t\r\n";
00247         std::string::size_type  begin;
00248         std::string::size_type  end;
00249 
00250         out->clear();
00251         begin = s.find_first_not_of(whitespace);
00252         if (begin == s.npos)
00253             return;
00254         end = s.find_last_not_of(whitespace);
00255         *out = s.substr(begin, end + 1);
00256     }
00257 
00262     static bool check_identifier(const char ch)
00263     {
00264         return (isalnum(ch) || (ch) == '_');
00265     }
00266 
00271     bool get_value(const std::string &key) const
00272     {
00273         item_type::const_iterator found = map_.find(key);
00274         if (found != map_.end()) {
00275             parse_recursive(found->second, &reserve_);
00276             return true;
00277         }
00278         return false;
00279     }
00280     
00285     void insert(const std::string &s)
00286     {
00287         int break_pos = s.find("=");
00288         std::string key;
00289         std::string value;
00290 
00291         trim(s.substr(0, break_pos), &key);
00292         trim(s.substr(break_pos + 1), &value);
00293 
00294         if (!key.empty())
00295             map_[key] = value;
00296     }
00297 
00303     void parse_once(const std::string &str, std::string *out) const
00304     {
00305         enum {
00306             PS_UNKNOW = 0,
00307             PS_ESCAPE,
00308             PS_DOLLAR,
00309             PS_FETCHKEY,
00310             PS_REPLACE,
00311             PS_FINISH,
00312             PS_REPLACE_FINISH,
00313         } state = PS_UNKNOW;
00314 
00315         bool brace_open = false;
00316         std::string key;
00317 
00318         out->clear();
00319         for (const char *pch = str.c_str(); /* Forever */ ; pch++) {
00320             if (*pch == '\\')
00321                 state = PS_ESCAPE;
00322             else if (*pch == '\0')
00323                 state = (state == PS_FETCHKEY)?PS_REPLACE_FINISH:PS_FINISH;
00324             else if (*pch == '$' && state != PS_ESCAPE)
00325                 state = PS_DOLLAR;
00326             else if (state == PS_DOLLAR)
00327                 state = PS_FETCHKEY;
00328             else if (state == PS_FETCHKEY &&
00329                     !check_identifier(*pch) && *pch != '{')
00330                 state = PS_REPLACE;
00331             else if (state != PS_FETCHKEY)
00332                 state = PS_UNKNOW;
00333 
00334             if (state == PS_UNKNOW) {
00335                 out->append(pch, 1);
00336             } else if (state == PS_FETCHKEY) {
00337                 if (check_identifier(*pch))
00338                     key.append(pch, 1);
00339                 if (*pch == '{')
00340                     brace_open = true;
00341             } else if (state == PS_REPLACE || state == PS_REPLACE_FINISH) {
00342                 item_type::const_iterator found = map_.find(key);
00343                 if (found != map_.end()) {
00344                     out->append(found->second);
00345                     key.clear();
00346                 }
00347                 if (!(brace_open && *pch == '}'))
00348                     pch--;
00349             }
00350             if (state == PS_FINISH || state == PS_REPLACE_FINISH)
00351                 break;
00352         }
00353     }
00354 
00360     void parse_recursive(const std::string &str, std::string *out) const
00361     {
00362         std::string lhs(str), rhs;
00363 
00364         for (size_t i = 0;
00365              i < recursion_level_ && str.find('$') < str.npos;
00366              i++) {
00367             parse_once(lhs, &rhs);
00368             lhs = rhs;
00369         }
00370         *out = lhs;
00371     }
00372 
00373   private:
00374     DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN(TextConfig);
00375 };
00376 
00377 #endif  // TEXT_CONFIG_H_
